document_id.description: Primary ID of this document record.

provenance.description: Origin and chain-of-custody for the document content.

files.description: Binary/file pointers for the canonical document and any normalized attachments (non-email specific).

corporate_details.description: Details specific to corporate formation and governance documents.

governance_details.description: Details specific to the internal governance rules of an entity, typically found in Bylaws or Operating Agreements.

director_quorum_requirement.description: The quorum required for board meetings (e.g., 'A majority of directors', '51%').

shareholder_quorum_requirement.description: The quorum required for shareholder meetings.

director_count.description: The number of directors or the allowed range (e.g., '3', 'Not less than 3 nor more than 7').

officer_titles.description: A list of the officer positions defined (e.g., President, Secretary, Treasurer).

fiscal_year_end.description: The end date of the corporation's fiscal year (e.g., 'December 31st').

indemnification_clause_summary.description: A brief summary of the indemnification provisions for directors and officers.

llc_operating_details.description: Details specific to the governance and financial arrangements of a Limited Liability Company (LLC).

management_type.description: Specifies whether the LLC is managed by its members or by appointed managers.

profit_loss_distribution.description: A summary of how profits and losses are allocated among members (e.g., 'In proportion to Membership Interest', '50/50').

tax_matters_member.description: The name of the member designated as the 'Partnership Representative' for tax purposes.

partnership_details.description: Details specific to the formation and operation of a Partnership or Joint Venture.

partnership_purpose.description: The stated business purpose of the partnership or joint venture.

management_structure.description: A summary of how the partnership is managed (e.g., 'By the General Partner', 'By a Management Committee').

profit_loss_distribution.description: A summary of how profits and losses are allocated among the partners.

partnership_term.description: The duration of the partnership (e.g., 'Perpetual', '5 years', 'Until project completion').

shareholder_agreement_details.description: Details specific to the rights, restrictions, and obligations among shareholders or members of an entity.

transfer_restrictions.description: A summary of the restrictions on selling or transferring shares.

right_of_first_refusal_rofr.description: Summary of the ROFR clause, if present (e.g., 'Company has 30 days to match any bona fide offer').

drag_along_rights.description: Summary of the drag-along provision, specifying the trigger threshold (e.g., 'Majority shareholders can force minority to sell').

tag_along_rights.description: Summary of the tag-along provision, allowing minority shareholders to join a sale.

buy_sell_triggers.description: A list of events that trigger the buy-sell provisions (e.g., 'Death', 'Disability', 'Termination of Employment', 'Divorce').

valuation_method.description: How the share price is determined for a buyout (e.g., 'Annual appraisal', 'Book value', 'Formula based on earnings').

buy_sell_details.description: Details specific to the terms of a buy-sell agreement governing the transfer of ownership interests upon certain trigger events.

triggering_events.description: A list of events that activate the buy-sell agreement (e.g., 'Death', 'Disability', 'Retirement', 'Involuntary Termination').

purchase_obligation.description: Specifies if the buyout is mandatory or optional (e.g., 'Mandatory purchase by the Company', 'Option for remaining shareholders to purchase').

valuation_method.description: How the business interest is valued for the buyout (e.g., 'Certificate of Agreed Value', 'Formula based on revenue', 'Third-party appraisal').

funding_mechanism.description: How the buyout will be funded (e.g., 'Life insurance policies', 'Company cash flow', 'Promissory note over 5 years').

statement_of_information_details.description: Details specific to a state-mandated compliance filing like a Statement of Information or Annual Report.

entity_file_number.description: The official file number assigned by the Secretary of State.

entity_type.description: The legal structure of the entity (e.g., 'Limited Liability Company', 'Corporation').

jurisdiction.description: The state or country of formation.

certificate_details.description: Details specific to an official certificate issued by a state authority, such as a Certificate of Good Standing.

entity_file_number.description: The official file number assigned by the issuing authority.

entity_type.description: The legal structure of the entity (e.g., 'Limited Liability Company', 'Corporation').

jurisdiction.description: The state or country of formation.

issue_date.description: The date the certificate was issued.

foreign_qualification_details.description: Details specific to an entity's registration to do business in a state other than its state of formation.

entity_file_number.description: The file number assigned by the qualifying state.

home_jurisdiction.description: The original state or country of formation (the 'domestic' state).

qualified_jurisdiction.description: The state granting the authority to transact business (the 'foreign' state).

qualification_date.description: The date the entity was granted authority to transact business in the foreign state.

registered_agent_filing_details.description: Details specific to a state filing regarding an entity's registered agent for service of process.

entity_file_number.description: The official file number assigned by the Secretary of State.

filing_type.description: The nature of the filing (e.g., 'Change of Agent', 'Resignation of Agent', 'Appointment of Agent').

tax_details.description: Details specific to tax-related documents and information.

ein.description: The 9-digit Employer Identification Number assigned to the entity.

form_reference.description: The official form number referenced in the document (e.g., 'CP-575', '1099-S').

business_name_filing_details.description: Details specific to a DBA or Fictitious Business Name filing.

fictitious_business_name.description: The 'doing business as' name being registered.

corporate_action_details.description: Details specific to a corporate action, such as a board resolution or meeting minutes.

action_type.description: The type of corporate action being recorded.

resolutions_passed.description: A list summarizing the key decisions or resolutions approved.

attendees.description: A list of individuals present at the meeting.

voting_summary.description: A summary of the vote outcome (e.g., 'Unanimously approved', 'Passed by a majority vote').

officer_appointment_details.description: Details specific to the appointment of individuals to officer positions within an entity.

appointed_officers.description: A list of individuals and the officer titles they were appointed to.

employment_details.description: Details specific to the terms of an employment relationship.

bonus_structure.description: A summary of any performance bonus, signing bonus, or other incentive compensation.

termination_clause_summary.description: A brief summary of the conditions for termination, including notice period or 'at-will' status.

contractor_details.description: Details specific to the terms of an independent contractor relationship.

scope_of_work_summary.description: A brief summary of the services the contractor will provide.

compensation_summary.description: A summary of the payment terms (e.g., '$5,000 fixed fee', '$100 per hour', 'Paid upon completion').

term_of_agreement.description: The duration of the agreement (e.g., '6 months', 'Until project completion', 'Effective from X to Y').

termination_clause_summary.description: A brief summary of the conditions for termination, including any required notice period.

consulting_details.description: Details specific to the terms of a professional consulting engagement.

scope_of_services_summary.description: A brief summary of the advisory services the consultant will provide.

compensation_summary.description: A summary of the payment terms (e.g., '$5,000 monthly retainer', '$250 per hour', 'Project-based fee').

term_of_agreement.description: The duration of the consulting engagement.

confidentiality_clause_summary.description: A brief summary of the confidentiality obligations.

nda_details.description: Details specific to the terms of a Non-Disclosure or Confidentiality Agreement.

nda_type.description: Specifies whether the NDA is mutual or one-way.

purpose_of_disclosure.description: A summary of the reason for sharing confidential information.

term_of_confidentiality.description: The duration the receiving party must keep the information confidential (e.g., '5 years', 'Perpetual').

definition_of_confidential_info.description: A brief summary of what constitutes confidential information under the agreement.

ip_assignment_details.description: Details specific to the assignment of intellectual property rights.

assignment_scope.description: A summary of the types of intellectual property being assigned to the company.

prior_inventions_clause.description: A summary of the clause addressing inventions created by the individual prior to their engagement with the company.

insurance_details.description: Details specific to insurance policies and certificates of insurance.

coverage_type.description: e.g., General Liability, Automobile Liability, Umbrella, Workers Compensation

loi_details.description: Details specific to the preliminary terms outlined in a Letter of Intent.

due_diligence_period.description: The length of the due diligence period (e.g., '120 days').

closing_period.description: The timeframe for closing after conditions are met (e.g., '30 calendar days').

correction_details.description: Details specific to a Certificate of Correction for a previously recorded document.

correction_summary.description: Details of what is being corrected in the original document.

original_document_recording_date.description: The recording date of the original document that is being corrected.

original_document_instrument_number.description: The instrument or document number of the original document that is being corrected.

improvement_agreement_details.description: Details specific to a Subdivision Improvement Agreement.

plan_details.description: Details specific to engineering or architectural plan sets.

dedication_details.description: Details specific to an offer to dedicate property for public use.

environmental_details.description: Details specific to environmental review documents (CEQA/NEPA).

technical_study_details.description: Details specific to a technical study or report.

remediation_plan_details.description: Details specific to a hazardous materials remediation plan.

dust_control_plan_details.description: Details specific to a dust control plan.

permit_details.description: Details specific to a permit issued by a government agency.

biological_opinion_details.description: Details specific to a USFWS/NMFS Biological Opinion or Incidental Take Permit.

stormwater_details.description: Details specific to stormwater compliance documents.

hcp_details.description: Details specific to a Habitat Conservation Plan (HCP).

easement_details.description: Details specific to an easement agreement.

mitigation_credit_details.description: Details specific to the purchase or sale of mitigation or conservation credits.

monitoring_report_details.description: Details specific to a mitigation monitoring report.

utility_service_details.description: Details specific to utility service letters and agreements.

fee_details.description: Details specific to development fees, credits, and reimbursements.

loan_details.description: Details specific to a loan or financing agreement.

appraisal_details.description: Details specific to a property appraisal.

reliance_letter_details.description: Details specific to a reliance letter for a technical report.

transmittal_details.description: Details specific to a transmittal letter or email.

flood_details.description: Details specific to a flood hazard determination.

assignment_details.description: Details specific to the assignment and assumption of a contract or property.

guaranty_details.description: Details specific to a guaranty agreement.

intercreditor_details.description: Details specific to an intercreditor agreement between lenders.

subordination_details.description: Details specific to a subordination agreement.

snda_details.description: Details specific to a Subordination, Non-Disturbance, and Attornment Agreement.

budget_details.description: Details specific to a project budget or cost analysis.

draw_request_details.description: Details specific to a construction loan draw request.

title_details.description: Details specific to title insurance reports, commitments, and policies.

inspection_report_details.description: Details specific to a construction or property inspection report.

offering_details.description: Details specific to a private placement or investment offering.

capital_call_details.description: Details specific to a capital call or investor consent.

derivative_details.description: Details specific to a financial derivative or hedging agreement.

construction_contract_details.description: Details specific to a construction contract.

design_contract_details.description: Details specific to a design or architectural services agreement.

subcontract_details.description: Details specific to a subcontract agreement.

schedule_details.description: Details specific to a project schedule.

schedule_of_values_details.description: Details specific to a schedule of values for a construction contract.

rfi_details.description: Details specific to a Request for Information (RFI).

submittal_details.description: Details specific to a construction submittal or shop drawing.

daily_report_details.description: Details specific to a daily construction report.

change_order_details.description: Details specific to a construction change order.

safety_plan_details.description: Details specific to a safety plan.

testing_report_details.description: Details specific to a materials testing report.

pay_application_details.description: Details specific to a construction payment application.

lien_waiver_details.description: Details specific to a mechanic's lien waiver and release.

preliminary_notice_details.description: Details specific to a preliminary notice for mechanic's lien rights.

stop_payment_notice_details.description: Details specific to a stop payment notice.

mechanics_lien_details.description: Details specific to a mechanic's lien.

bond_details.description: Details specific to a surety bond.

warranty_details.description: Details specific to a product or system warranty.

punch_list_details.description: Details specific to a construction punch list.

completion_certificate_details.description: Details specific to a certificate of completion.

occupancy_certificate_details.description: Details specific to a certificate of occupancy.

cfd_details.description: Details specific to a Community Facilities District (Mello-Roos) or Assessment District.

resolution_details.description: Details specific to a formal resolution by a governing body.

assessment_district_details.description: Details specific to an Assessment District.

tax_agreement_details.description: Details specific to a tax-related agreement like a PILOT or abatement.

deal_terms.description: Details specific to the core terms of a real estate or business transaction.

property_description.description: A brief description of the property being transacted.

due_diligence_period.description: The length of the due diligence or inspection period (e.g., '30 days', '60 days from execution').

closing_period.description: The timeframe for closing after due diligence (e.g., '15 days after waiver of contingencies').

is_binding.description: Indicates whether a preliminary document (like an LOI) is stated to be binding or non-binding.

financing_district_details.description: Details specific to an EIFD or TIF district.

lease_details.description: Details specific to a property lease agreement.

lease_amendment_details.description: Details specific to a lease amendment, extension, or renewal.

rules_and_regulations_details.description: Details specific to building or project rules and regulations.

lease_clause_details.description: Details specific to key lease clauses like exclusives or co-tenancy.

ti_work_letter_details.description: Details specific to a tenant improvement work letter.

signage_details.description: Details specific to signage rights and agreements.

shared_facility_details.description: Details specific to a parking or shared facilities agreement.

rent_roll_details.description: Details specific to a property rent roll.

cam_details.description: Details specific to a Common Area Maintenance (CAM) budget or reconciliation.

move_in_out_details.description: Details specific to a move-in or move-out inspection report.

compliance_notice_details.description: Details specific to a tenant compliance notice.

exclusivity_period.description: The duration of the exclusivity or no-shop period (e.g., '30 days from the Effective Date').

scope_of_exclusivity.description: A summary of what the seller is prohibited from doing (e.g., 'soliciting, negotiating, or accepting alternative proposals').

listing_agreement_details.description: Details specific to a real estate listing or commission agreement.

co_broker_agreement_details.description: Details specific to a co-brokerage agreement.

bov_details.description: Details specific to a Broker Opinion of Value (BOV).

offering_memorandum_details.description: Details specific to a real estate offering memorandum.

ccr_details.description: Details specific to a declaration of CC&Rs.

hoa_financial_details.description: Details specific to HOA financial documents.

property_description.description: A description of the property subject to the option.

option_fee.description: The consideration paid for the option right.

option_period.description: The duration during which the option can be exercised.

exercise_price.description: The pre-agreed price to purchase the property if the option is exercised.

exercise_procedure.description: A summary of how the option must be exercised (e.g., 'Written notice to Optionor').

license_details.description: Details specific to a business license.

tax_appeal_details.description: Details specific to a property tax appeal.

requested_item_categories.description: A list of the main categories of documents requested.

oz_details.description: Details specific to a Qualified Opportunity Zone investment.

cost_segregation_details.description: Details specific to a cost segregation study.

depreciation_schedule_details.description: Details specific to a depreciation schedule.

disclosure_details.description: Details specific to seller disclosures about a property's condition.

disclosed_issues.description: A list of all affirmative disclosures made by the seller.

mineral_rights_details.description: Details specific to mineral, oil, or gas rights.

correspondence_details.description: Details specific to correspondence like letters or memos.

hearing_details.description: Details specific to a public hearing notice.

proof_of_service_details.description: Details specific to a proof of service.

public_records_request_details.description: Details specific to a public records act request or response.

decision_log_details.description: Details specific to a project decision log.

mou_details.description: Details specific to a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU).

legal_strategy_memo_details.description: Details specific to a legal strategy memorandum.

escrow_details.description: Details specific to escrow instructions for a transaction.

wire_details.description: Details specific to wire transfer instructions.

release_details.description: Details specific to an authorization to release funds from an account.

payoff_details.description: Details specific to a loan payoff demand.

settlement_statement_details.description: Details specific to a settlement statement (like an ALTA) summarizing the financials of a closing.

deed_details.description: Details specific to a deed transferring title to real property.

bill_of_sale_details.description: Details specific to a bill of sale transferring personal property.

exchange_details.description: Details specific to a 1031 tax-deferred exchange.

survey_details.description: Details specific to a land survey.

table_a_items.description: A list of the optional ALTA Table A items included in the survey.

offer_details.description: Details specific to a formal offer.

entitlement_details.description: Details specific to land use entitlements and government approvals.
